mutants.code:
import re

def is_valid_css_selector(selector):
    pattern = '^[.#]?[a-zA-Z_][\\w-]*(:\\w+)?(\\s+[>+~]\\s*[.#]?[a-zA-Z_][\\w-]*(:\\w+)?)*$'
    return re.match(pattern, selector) is None
